Privacy.summary: Modern browsers already have a wealth of features to protect users' privacy on the web, but that's not enough. To create a trustworthy and privacy-respecting experience, developers need to educate their site users in good practices (and enforce them). Developers should also create sites that collect as little data from users as possible, use the data responsibly, and transport and store it securely.
